title: Might Other
data:
{{version025}}
{{Flavour|Significally increases a nearby ally's damage dealt in melee.}}

'''Might Other''' is monsters-only spell that gives the [[might]] enchantment to another monster, greatly enhancing its prowess in melee combat. Deep troll shamans can only use this spell on other [[list of trolls|trolls]]. Ironbrand convoker has no such limitation.

{{monsters with spell}}

==Strategy==
Having a caster with Might Other on your side is extremely useful. Fortunately, deep troll shamans that you capture through [[Yredelemnul]]'s Enslave Soul ability are not limited to just buffing trolls.

==History==
*Might Other was added in [[0.12]].
